parameters.name: XAngle
parameters.description: Angle of rotation between x axes

parameters.name: YAngle
parameters.description: Angle of rotation between y axes

parameters.name: ZAngle
parameters.description: Angle of rotation between z axes

title: IModelDocExtension.GetCSYSXYZAngularRotation
description: Gets the specified Tait-Bryan angular rotation values that transform one selected coordinate system into another.
signature:
System.Boolean GetCSYSXYZAngularRotation( 
   out System.Double
XAngle
,
   out System.Double
YAngle
,
   out System.Double
ZAngle
)

parameters.name: XAngle
parameters.description: Angle of rotation between x axes

parameters.name: YAngle
parameters.description: Angle of rotation between y axes

parameters.name: ZAngle
parameters.description: Angle of rotation between z axes

returns: True if rotation values successfully retrieved, false if not
remarks:
This method corresponds to the SOLIDWORKS measure tool's calculation of angular rotation between two coordinate systems. See
SOLIDWORKS online help > Fundamentals > Measure Tool
for more information.
Use Wikipedia to learn about Tait-Bryan or Cardan angles.
